諔字的基本解释

諔
chù
〔諔诡〕奇异，如“彼且蕲以諔諔幻怪之名闻，不知至人之以是为己桎梏邪？”

諔
jí
古同“寂”，寂静。
安。

諔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chù］
［《集韻》昌六切，入屋，昌。］
诡异。
[②]［jì］
［《集韻》前歷切，入鍚，從。］
静寂。

諔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諔； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1168第11
【集韻】與?、??同。　又人名。崇諔，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【集韻】昌六切，音俶。詭也。【莊子·德充符】彼且蘄以諔詭幻怪之名聞。　又【集韻】之六切，音祝。義同。

諔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
諔字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
chù
〔Creative〕 Strange, such as "He is known for being fascinated by phantoms, but I don't know that the most people think that they are shackles for themselves?"
Yin
jí
The ancients are "silence", silence.
Ann.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chù］
["Ji Yun" Chang six cuts, enter the house, Chang. ]
Weird.
[②]［jì］
["Ji Yun" cuts in front of the calendar, enters, from. ]
Silence.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諔; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1168 to 11
【Jiyun】Same as ?? and ??.　Another name. Chong Lin, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Jiyun] Chang six cuts, sound chu. It's also tricky. [Zhuangzi·De Chong Fu] He Qiqi is famous for being strange and strange.　[Jiyun] Six Cuts, Sound Wishes. The same meaning.

Nothing.
chù, jì
только в сочетании
chù 諔诡
jì в дре. рав. 寂, 静寂
